00030 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00031 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00032 from PyQt4.uic import *
00033 import gettext
00034 from Koo.Common import Common
00035 
00036 from Koo import Rpc
00037 
00038 import csv, StringIO
00039 
00040 from ImportExportCommon import *
00041 
00042 def import_csv(csv_data, fields, model):
00043         fname = csv_data['fname']
00044         content = file(fname,'rb').read()
00045         input=StringIO.StringIO(content)
00046         data = list(csv.reader(input, quotechar=csv_data['del'], delimiter=csv_data['sep']))[int(csv_data['skip']):]
00047         datas = []
00048         for line in data:
00049                 datas.append(map(lambda x:x.decode(csv_data['encoding']).encode('utf-8'), line))
00050         res = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', model, 'import_data', fields, datas)
00051         if res[0]>=0:
00052                 QMessageBox.information( None, '', _('Imported %d objects !') % (res[0]))
00053         else:
00054                 d = ''
00055                 for key,val in res[1].items():
00056                         d+= ('\t%s: %s\n' % (str(key),str(val)))
00057                 error = _('Error trying to import this record:\n%(record)s\nError Message:\n%(error1)s\n\n%(error2)s') % {
00058                         'record': d,
00059                         'error1': res[2],
00060                         'error2': res[3]
00061                 }
00062                 QMessageBox.warning(None, _('Error importing data'), error )
00063 
00064 (ImportDialogUi, ImportDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('win_import.ui') )
00065 
00066 class ImportDialog(QDialog, ImportDialogUi):
00067         def __init__(self, model, fields, preload = [], parent=None):
00068                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00069                 ImportDialogUi.__init__(self)
00070                 self.setupUi( self )
00071 
00072                 self.model = model
00073                 self.fields = fields
00074                 self.connect( self.pushAccept, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotAccept )
00075                 self.connect( self.pushCancel, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.reject )
00076                 self.connect( self.pushAdd, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotAdd )
00077                 self.connect( self.pushRemove, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotRemove )
00078                 self.connect( self.pushRemoveAll, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotRemoveAll )
00079                 self.connect( self.pushAutoDetect, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotAutoDetect )
00080                 self.connect( self.pushOpenFile, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotOpenFile )
00081                 QTimer.singleShot( 0, self.initGui )
00082 
00083         def initGui(self):
00084                 self.fieldsInfo = {}
00085                 self.fieldsInvertedInfo = {}
00086                 self.allModel = FieldsModel()
00087                 self.setCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00088                 self.allModel.load( self.fields, self.fieldsInfo, self.fieldsInvertedInfo )
00089                 self.setCursor( Qt.ArrowCursor )
00090                 self.uiAllFields.setModel( self.allModel )
00091                 self.uiAllFields.sortByColumn( 0, Qt.AscendingOrder )
00092 
00093                 self.selectedModel = FieldsModel()
00094                 self.uiSelectedFields.setModel( self.selectedModel )
00095 
00096         def slotOpenFile(self):
00097                 file = QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, _('File to import'))
00098                 if file.isNull():
00099                         return
00100                 self.uiFileName.setText( file )
00101 
00102         def slotAccept(self):
00103                 self.uiLinesToSkip.setValue(1)
00104                 csv = {
00105                         'fname': unicode(self.uiFileName.text()).strip(),
00106                         'sep': unicode(self.uiFieldSeparator.text()).encode('ascii','ignore').strip(),
00107                         'del': unicode(self.uiTextDelimiter.text()).encode('ascii','ignore').strip(),
00108                         'skip': self.uiLinesToSkip.value(),
00109                         'encoding': unicode(self.uiEncoding.currentText())
00110                 }
00111                 if csv['fname'] == '':
00112                         QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Import error'), _('No file specified.'))
00113                         return
00114                 if len(csv['sep']) != 1:
00115                         QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Import error'), _('Separator must be a single character.'))
00116                         return
00117                 if len(csv['del']) != 1:
00118                         QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Import error'), _('Delimiter must be a single character.'))
00119                         return
00120                 fieldsData = []
00121                 for x in range(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount() ):
00122                         fieldsData.append( unicode( self.selectedModel.item( x ).data().toString() ) )
00123 
00124                 if csv['fname']:
00125                         import_csv(csv, fieldsData, self.model)
00126                 self.accept()
00127 
00128         def slotAdd(self):
00129                 idx = self.uiAllFields.selectionModel().selectedRows()
00130                 if len(idx) != 1:
00131                         return 
00132                 idx = idx[0]
00133                 item = self.allModel.itemFromIndex( idx )
00134                 newItem = QStandardItem( item )
00135                 newItem.setText( self.fullPathText(item) )
00136                 newItem.setData( QVariant(self.fullPathData(item)) )
00137                 self.selectedModel.appendRow( newItem )
00138 
00139         def slotRemove(self):
00140                 idx = self.uiSelectedFields.selectedIndexes()
00141                 if len(idx) != 1:
00142                         return
00143                 idx = idx[0]
00144                 self.selectedModel.removeRows( idx.row(), 1 )
00145 
00146         def slotRemoveAll(self):
00147                 if self.selectedModel.rowCount() > 0:
00148                         self.selectedModel.removeRows(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount())
00149 
00150         def fullPathText(self, item):
00151                 path = unicode( item.text() )
00152                 while item.parent() != None:
00153                         item = item.parent()
00154                         path = item.text() + "/" + path
00155                 return path
00156 
00157         def fullPathData(self, item):
00158                 path = unicode( item.data().toString() )
00159                 while item.parent() != None:
00160                         item = item.parent()
00161                         path = item.data().toString() + "/" + path
00162                 return path
00163 
00164         def slotAutoDetect(self):
00165                 fname=unicode(self.uiFileName.text())
00166                 if not fname:
00167                         QMessageBox.information(self, _('Auto-detect error'), 'You must select an import file first !')
00168                         return 
00169                 csvsep=unicode(self.uiFieldSeparator.text()).encode('ascii','ignore').strip()
00170                 csvdel=unicode(self.uiTextDelimiter.text()).encode('ascii','ignore').strip()
00171                 csvcode=unicode(self.uiEncoding.currentText()) or 'UTF-8'
00172 
00173                 self.uiLinesToSkip.setValue(1)
00174                 if len(csvsep) != 1:
00175                         QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Auto-detect error'), _('Separator must be a single character.'))
00176                         return
00177                 if len(csvdel) != 1:
00178                         QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Auto-detect error'), _('Delimiter must be a single character.'))
00179                         return
00180                 
00181                 try:
00182                         data = csv.reader(file(fname), quotechar=csvdel, delimiter=csvsep)
00183                 except:
00184                         QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Auto-detect error'), _('Error opening .CSV file: Input Error.') )
00185                         return 
00186                 self.slotRemoveAll()
00187                 try:
00188                         for line in data:
00189                                 for word in line:
00190                                         word=word.decode(csvcode).encode('utf-8')
00191                                         self.selectedModel.addField( word, self.fieldsInvertedInfo[word] )
00192                                 break
00193                 except:
00194                         QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Auto-detect error'), _('Error processing your first line of the file.\nField %s is unknown !') % (word) )
